Verses: 1 karththar Moseyai Nokki:
2 nee Isravel Puththirarode Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Neengal Kudiyirukkumpadi Naan Ungalukkuk Kodukkum Dhesaththil Neengal Poi Serndhapinbu,

3 viseshiththa Poruththanaiyaayaavadhu, Urchaaga Paliyaayaavadhu, Ungal Pandigaigalil Seluththum Paliyaayaavadhu, Karththarukku Maadugalilaagilum Aadugalilaagilum Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaiyaavadhu Matra Yaadhoru Paliyaiyaavadhu Karththarukku Sugandha Vaasanaiyaana Thaganamaagap Paliyidumpodhu,

4 than Padaippaik Karththarukku Seluththugiravan Sarvaanga Thaganapalikkaagilum Matrap Palikkaagilum Oru Aattukkuttiyudane, Oru Marakkaalile Paththil Oru Pangum Kaarpadi Enneyile Pisaindhadhumaana Melliya Maavin Pojanapaliyai Seluththakkadavan.
5 paanapaliyaaga Kaarpadi Dhraatcharasaththaiyum Padaikkavendum.
6 aattukkadaavaayirundhadheyaagil, Paththil Irandu Pangaanadhum, Oru Padiyil Moondril Oru Pangaagiya Enneyile Pisaindhadhumaana Melliya Maavin Pojanapaliyaiyum,
7 paanapaliyaaga Oru Padiyil Moondriloru Pangu Dhraatcharasaththaiyum Karththarukku Sugandha Vaasanaiyaana Padaippaagap Padaikkavendum.
8 nee Sarvaanga Thaganapalikkaagilum, Viseshiththa Poruththanai Palikkaagilum, Samaadhaana Palikkaagilum, Oru Kaalaiyaik Karththarukku Seluththa Aayaththappaduththumpodhu,
9 adhanode Paththil Moondru Pangaanadhum, Araippadi Enneyile Pisaindhadhumaana Melliya Maavin Pojanapaliyaiyum,
10 paanapaliyaaga Araippadi Dhraatcha Rasaththaiyum, Karththarukku Sugandhavaasanaiyaana Thaganapaliyaagap Padaikkavendum.
11 indhappragaaramaagave Ovvoru Maattukkaagilum, Aattukkadaavukkaagilum, Semmariyaattuk Kuttikkaagilum, Vellaattuk Kuttikkaagilum Seydhu Padaikkavendum.
12 neengal Padaikkiravaigalin Ilakkaththirkuththakkadhaai Ovvondrirkaagavum Indhappragaaram Seyyavendum.
13 sudhesaththil Pirandhavargal Yaavarum Karththarukku Sugandha Vaasanaiyaana Thaganapaliyai Seluththumpodhu Ivvidhamaagave Seyyavendum.

14 ungalidaththile Thangiyirukkira Anniyanaavadhu, Ungal Naduvile Ungal Thalaimuraithorum Kudiyirukkiravanaavadhu, Karththarukku Sugandha Vaasanaiyaana Thaganapali Seluththavendumaanaal, Neengal Seygirapadiye Avanum Seyyavendum.

15 sabaiyaaraagiya Ungalukkum Ungalidaththil Thangugira Anniyanukkum Ore Pramaanam Irukkavendum Enbadhu Ungal Thalaimuraigalil Niththiya Kattalaiyaayirukkakkadavadhu; Karththarukku Munbaaga Anniyanum Ungalaippolave Irukkavendum.
16 ungalukkum Ungalidaththil Thangugira Anniyanukkum Ore Pramaanamum Ore Muraimaiyum Irukkakkadavadhu Endru Sol Endraar.
17 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:
18 nee Isravel Puththirarode Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Naan Ungalai Azhaiththukkondupogira Dhesaththil Neengal Serndhu,
19 dhesaththin Aagaaraththaip Pusikkumpodhu, Karththarukku Ereduththup Padaikkum Kaanikkaiyai Seluththakkadaveergal.
20 ungal Pisaindha Maavinaal Seydha Mudharpalanaagiya Adhirasaththai Ereduththup Padaippeergalaaga; Poradikkira Kalaththin Padaippai Ereduththup Padaikkiradhupola Adhaiyum Ereduththup Padaikkavendum.
21 ippadi Ungal Thalaimuraithorum Ungal Pisaindha Maavin Mudharpalanilekarththarukkup Padaippai Ereduththup Padaikkakkadaveergal.
22 karththar Moseyinidaththil Sonna Indhak Karpanaigal Ellaavatrinpadiyum,
23 karththar Moseyaikkondu Kattalaikoduththa Naalmudharkondu Avar Ungalukkum Ungal Sandhadhigalukkum Niyamiththa Ellaavatrinpadiyeyum Neengal Seyyaamal,

24 ariyaamal Thavari Nadandhaalum, Sabaiyaarukkuth Theriyaamal Yaadhoru Thappidham Seydhaalum, Sabaiyaar Ellaarum Karththarukku Sugandha Vaasanaiyaana Thaganapaliyaaga Oru Kaalaiyaiyum, Muraimaippadi Adharketra Pojanapaliyaiyum, Paanapaliyaiyum, Paavanivaaranapaliyaaga Oru Vellaattukkadaavaiyum Seluththavendum.

25 adhinaal Aasaariyan Isravel Puththirarin Sabaiyanaiththirkaagavum Paavanivirththi Seyyakkadavan; Adhu Ariyaamaiyil Seyyappattapadiyaalum, Adhinimiththam Avargal Karththarukkuth Thaganapaliyaiyum Paavanivaaranapaliyaiyum Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Konduvandhadhinaalum, Adhu Avargalukku Mannikkappadum.
26 adhu Ariyaamaiyinaale Janangal Yaavarukkum Vandhapadiyaal, Adhu Isravel Puththirarin Sabaiyanaiththirkum Avargalukkulle Thangugira Anniyanukkum Mannikkappadum.
27 oruvan Ariyaamaiyinaal Paavancheydhaanaagil, Oru Vayadhaana Vellaattaip Paavanivaaranapaliyaaga Seluththakkadavan.
28 appozhudhu Ariyaamaiyinaal Paavancheydhavanukkaaga Aasaariyan Paavanivirththi Seyyumpadi Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Paavanivirththi Seyyakkadavan, Appozhudhu Avanukku Mannikkappadum.
29 isravel Puththiraraagiya Ungalil Pirandhavanukkum Ungalukkulle Thangum Anniyanukkum, Ariyaamaiyinaal Paavancheydhavanimiththam, Ore Pramaanam Irukkavendum.

30 andriyum Dhesaththile Pirandhavargalilaagilum Anniyargalilaagilum, Evanaavadhu Thunigaramaai Yaadhondrai Seydhaal, Avan Karththarai Nindhikkiraan; Andha Aaththumaa Than Janaththaaril Iraadhapadikku Aruppundupogavendum.
31 avan Karththarin Vaarththaiyai Asattaipanni, Avar Karpanaiyai Meerinapadiyaal, Andha Aaththumaa Aruppundupogavendum; Avan Akkiramam Avanmel Irukkum Endru Sol Endraar.
32 isravel Puththirar Vanaandharaththil Irukkaiyil, Oivunaalil Viragugalaip Porukkikkondirundha Oru Manidhanaik Kandupidiththaargal.
33 viragugalaip Porukkina Andha Manidhanaik Kandupidiththavargal, Avanai Mose Aaron Enbavargalidaththukkum Sabaiyaar Anaivaridaththukkum Konduvandhaargal.
34 avanukku Seyyavendiyadhu Innadhendru Theerkkamaana Uththaravu Illaadhapadiyinaal, Avanaik Kaavalil Vaiththaargal.
35 karththar Moseyai Nokki: Andha Manidhan Nichchayamaaik Kolaiseyyappadavendum; Sabaiyaar Ellaarum Avanaip Paalayaththirkup Purambe Kalleriyakkadavargal Endraar.
36 appozhudhu Sabaiyaar Ellaarum Karththar Mosekkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye, Avanaip Paalayaththirkup Purambe Kondupoik Kallerindhaargal; Avan Seththaan.
37 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:

38 nee Isravel Puththiraridaththil Pesi, Avargal Thangal Thalaimuraithorum Thangal Vasthirangalin Orangalile Thongalgalai Undaakki, Oraththin Thongalile Ilaneelanaadaavaik Kattavendumendru Avargalukku Sol.

39 neengal Pinpatri Sorampogira Ungal Irudhayaththukkum Ungal Kangalukkum Erka Nadavaamal, Adhaippaarththu, Karththarin Karpanaigalaiyellaam Ninaiththu Avaigalinpadiye Seyyumpadikku, Adhu Ungalukkuth Thongalaai Irukkavendum.
40 neengal En Karpanaigalaiyellaam Ninaiththu, Avaigalinpadiye Seydhu, Ungal Dhevanukkup Parisuththaraayirukkumpadi Adhaip Paarppeergalaaga.
41 naan Ungalukku Dhevanaayirukkumpadi, Ungalai Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Purappadappannina Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar; Naane Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarendru Sol Endraar.
